'''Kachina''' is a playable {{Geo}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Bearing the [[Ancient Name]] of {{Ancient Name|UTBT|'''Uthabiti'''|bearer=1}}, Kachina is a young warrior belonging to the [[Children of Echoes]] who is determined to become strong in spite of the numerous failures she has experienced.
